titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the People's Republic of China should be held accountable for its handling of COVID-19.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the People's Republic of China should be held accountable for its handling of COVID-19.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the global COVID-19 outbreak is a direct result of China's human rights abuses and propaganda campaign.The resolution also states that China should be held accountable for its handling of the outbreak.
